Business Name: Pulmonary And Sleep Associates Of Alabama PC

Business Information: Don't wait to get the important care you need. When you need care, Ascension is committed to keeping you safe while you're receiving it. Our hospitals and clinics have implemented safety precautions to protect our patients and our care teams. Call to discuss the right option for your care.

Don't wait to get the important care you need. When you need care, Ascension is committed to keeping you safe while you're receiving it. Our hospitals and clinics have implemented safety precautions to protect our patients and our care teams. Call to discuss the right option for your care.

Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC provides treat anent for pulmonary disorders. The center offers a range of services, such as asthma, treatment education, smoking cessation provide counseling, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)and the occupational lung disease. It is involved in chest X-rays, lung function evaluations, methacholine challenge tests, asthma assessments and arterial blood gas testing, among others. Additionally, Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC provides evaluation, diagnosis and treatment of pulmonary illnesses, to name a few.

Business Name: Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC
Business Information: Formed more than fifty years ago, Pulmonary Associates has remained in practice primarily in the Birmingham area with an outreach clinic in Oneonta, Alabama. We practice preventive medicine through counseling and testing. We have a sense of community and take care of our patients as though they are family. We have physicians board certified in sleep medicine and direct the sleep lab at Grandview Medical Center Sleep Disorders Center In Birmingham. Sleep Disorders, Polysomnography, Obstructive Sleep Apnea, Restless Legs Syndrome and Periodic Limb Movement Disorder, Narcaolepsy, Circadian Disorders, and Insomnia.

Pulmonary And Critical Care Specialist Of Princeton

Business Information: Don't wait to get the important care you need. When you need care, Ascension is committed to keeping you safe while you're receiving it. Our hospitals and clinics have implemented safety precautions to protect our patients and our care teams. Call to discuss the right option for your care.

Norwood Clinic, established in 1925 and based in Birmingham, Ala., is one of the largest privately owned multispecialty medical group practices in Alabama. The clinic has more than 40 physicians practicing in over 20 primary care, medical and surgical specialties. Its specialty areas include bone mineral density testing, cardiac surgery, family medicine, gastroenterology, internal medicine, nephrology, neurosurgery and occupational medicine. The specialty areas also include ophthalmology, pathology, podiatric medicine, pulmonary diseases, radiology and diagnostic imaging, rheumatology, surgery, urology, vascular surgery, and wound care and hyperbarics. Norwood Clinic additionally maintains several affiliated practice sites serving northern Alabama. The clinic s specialists also travel to more than 15 sites throughout Birmingham and northern Alabama.

Eastern Pulmonary, Sleep & Allergy, P.C has been doing business since its formation in 2001. It offers a variety of patient services, including chest X-rays, sleep studies, pulmonary function testing, thoracentesis, fiber optic bronchoscopy and oxygen assessment. Additionally, it provides radiology services, such as computerized tomography (CT) scans, magnetic resonance scanning (MRIs) and positron emission tomography (PET) scans. The practice serves health care needs of patients across the Greater Birmingham area, St. Clair, Blount, Walker and surrounding counties.

Business Information: Oksana Senyk, MD, PhD, PLLC, in Homewood offers pulmonary services including bronchoscopy, pulmonary function test, asthma treatments, allergy treatments & more. Our patient-friendly Homewood office is equipped with some of the most advanced medical technology available, making it one of the premier pulmonary practices in the state of AL. Once inside our comfortable and modern facility, you can relax while watching TV or enjoy views of Birmingham's beautiful downtown skyline. Business Information: Don't wait to get the important care you need. When you need care, Ascension is committed to keeping you safe while you're receiving it. Our hospitals and clinics have implemented safety precautions to protect our patients and our care teams. Call to discuss the right option for your care.

Norwood Clinic, established in 1925 and based in Birmingham, Ala., is one of the largest privately owned multispecialty medical group practices in Alabama. The clinic has more than 40 physicians practicing in over 20 primary care, medical and surgical specialties. Its specialty areas include bone mineral density testing, cardiac surgery, family medicine, gastroenterology, internal medicine, nephrology, neurosurgery and occupational medicine. The specialty areas also include ophthalmology, pathology, podiatric medicine, pulmonary diseases, radiology and diagnostic imaging, rheumatology, surgery, urology, vascular surgery, and wound care and hyperbarics. Norwood Clinic additionally maintains several affiliated practice sites serving northern Alabama. The clinic s specialists also travel to more than 15 sites throughout Birmingham and northern Alabama.

Eastern Pulmonary, Sleep & Allergy, P.C has been doing business since its formation in 2001. It offers a variety of patient services, including chest X-rays, sleep studies, pulmonary function testing, thoracentesis, fiber optic bronchoscopy and oxygen assessment. Additionally, it provides radiology services, such as computerized tomography (CT) scans, magnetic resonance scanning (MRIs) and positron emission tomography (PET) scans. The practice serves health care needs of patients across the Greater Birmingham area, St. Clair, Blount, Walker and surrounding counties.

Business Name: Dr. Dick D Briggs Jr., MD
Dr. William C Hays III, MD
Dr. James L Lewis III, MD
Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC

Business Information: Oksana Senyk, MD, PhD, PLLC, in Homewood offers pulmonary services including bronchoscopy, pulmonary function test, asthma treatments, allergy treatments & more. Our patient-friendly Homewood office is equipped with some of the most advanced medical technology available, making it one of the premier pulmonary practices in the state of AL. Once inside our comfortable and modern facility, you can relax while watching TV or enjoy views of Birmingham's beautiful downtown skyline. Contact Dr. Senyk today to schedule an appointment at our pulmonary medicine office serving Birmingham, AL. You can also reach our pulmonary practice by phone.

Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC provides treat anent for pulmonary disorders. The center offers a range of services, such as asthma, treatment education, smoking cessation provide counseling, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)and the occupational lung disease. It is involved in chest X-rays, lung function evaluations, methacholine challenge tests, asthma assessments and arterial blood gas testing, among others. Additionally, Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC provides evaluation, diagnosis and treatment of pulmonary illnesses, to name a few.

Business Name: Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC
Business Information: Formed more than fifty years ago, Pulmonary Associates has remained in practice primarily in the Birmingham area with an outreach clinic in Oneonta, Alabama. We practice preventive medicine through counseling and testing. We have a sense of community and take care of our patients as though they are family. We have physicians board certified in sleep medicine and direct the sleep lab at Grandview Medical Center Sleep Disorders Center In Birmingham. Sleep Disorders, Polysomnography, Obstructive Sleep Apnea, Restless Legs Syndrome and Periodic Limb Movement Disorder, Narcaolepsy, Circadian Disorders, and Insomnia.

Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC provides treat anent for pulmonary disorders. The center offers a range of services, such as asthma, treatment education, smoking cessation provide counseling, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)and the occupational lung disease. It is involved in chest X-rays, lung function evaluations, methacholine challenge tests, asthma assessments and arterial blood gas testing, among others. Additionally, Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC provides evaluation, diagnosis and treatment of pulmonary illnesses, to name a few.

Business Name: Pulmonary Associates of the Southeast PC
Business Information: Formed more than fifty years ago, Pulmonary Associates has remained in practice primarily in the Birmingham area with an outreach clinic in Oneonta, Alabama. We practice preventive medicine through counseling and testing. We have a sense of community and take care of our patients as though they are family. We have physicians board certified in sleep medicine and direct the sleep lab at Grandview Medical Center Sleep Disorders Center In Birmingham. Sleep Disorders, Polysomnography, Obstructive Sleep Apnea, Restless Legs Syndrome and Periodic Limb Movement Disorder, Narcaolepsy, Circadian Disorders, and Insomnia.

Norwood Clinic, established in 1925 and based in Birmingham, Ala., is one of the largest privately owned multispecialty medical group practices in Alabama. The clinic has more than 40 physicians practicing in over 20 primary care, medical and surgical specialties. Its specialty areas include bone mineral density testing, cardiac surgery, family medicine, gastroenterology, internal medicine, nephrology, neurosurgery and occupational medicine. The specialty areas also include ophthalmology, pathology, podiatric medicine, pulmonary diseases, radiology and diagnostic imaging, rheumatology, surgery, urology, vascular surgery, and wound care and hyperbarics. Norwood Clinic additionally maintains several affiliated practice sites serving northern Alabama. The clinic s specialists also travel to more than 15 sites throughout Birmingham and northern Alabama.

Eastern Pulmonary, Sleep & Allergy, P.C has been doing business since its formation in 2001. It offers a variety of patient services, including chest X-rays, sleep studies, pulmonary function testing, thoracentesis, fiber optic bronchoscopy and oxygen assessment. Additionally, it provides radiology services, such as computerized tomography (CT) scans, magnetic resonance scanning (MRIs) and positron emission tomography (PET) scans. The practice serves health care needs of patients across the Greater Birmingham area, St. Clair, Blount, Walker and surrounding counties.
